CustomField.description: This field determines whether or not the customer's portal will show the Chargent connected payment button/form or if it will show the form that simply collects payment information up front. True is the latter, false is the former.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field determines whether or not the customer's portal will show the Chargent connected payment button/form or if it will show the form that simply collects payment information up front. True is the latter, false is the former.
CustomField.label: Auto-Payment Form
